website_summaries.verdict: Nice price point for a light box that delivers the basics. Very thin light box that should fit easily in a backpack.
pros: Great choice for beginners who would like to try a light box tracer for the first time
Gives you an A4 paper size drawing surface, which is about average
Measures about 0.12" thick, so it's lightweight and portable
Brightness of LED panels is adjustable
Includes a USB cable to provide power to the unit
cons: Lights will automatically power down after anywhere from a few to several minutes of use
